mapper.insert: insert into musteat_night(name, phone, address, message, category) values(#{name}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{message}, #{category})
mapper.update: update musteat_night set name = #{name}, phone = #{phone}, address = #{address}, message = #{message}, coupon = #{coupon}, couponnum = #{couponnum} where bno = #{bno}
mapper.insert: insert into musteat_comment(userId, name, content, reviewStar, commentId) values(#{userId}, #{name}, #{content}, #{reviewStar}, #{commentId})
mapper.select: select bno ,name ,content ,regDate ,reviewStar ,commentId from musteat_comment where commentId = #{bno}

select userId , commentId , count(*) as commentCnt from musteat_comment where commentId = #{bno}
group by userId
